scripts.coverage: forge coverage --report lcov && lcov --ignore-errors inconsistent --remove lcov.info 'script/*' --remove lcov.info 'src/mocks/*' --output-file lcov.info --rc lcov_branch_coverage=1 && genhtml --ignore-errors inconsistent lcov.info -o report --branch-coverage && open report/index.html
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && git push origin master develop --follow-tags
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && git push origin master develop --follow-tags
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && git push origin master develop --follow-tags
